images.name: app_icon
images.prompt: Modern mobile app icon for a fitness tracking app. Minimalist flat design with a running figure silhouette. Vibrant orange gradient background. Rounded corners suitable for iOS/Android. Professional and memorable.

images.name: hero_banner
images.prompt: Website hero banner for a fitness app landing page. Dynamic abstract shapes suggesting movement and energy. Orange to red gradient colors. Clean composition with space for text. Modern, motivating atmosphere.

images.name: feature_workout
images.prompt: Feature illustration showing workout tracking concept. Flat vector style with orange and gray colors. Shows stylized person with data visualization elements around them. Clean, modern app aesthetic.

images.name: feature_progress
images.prompt: Feature illustration showing progress tracking concept. Flat vector style with orange and gray colors. Shows upward trending graph with achievement badges. Clean, motivating design.

images.name: empty_state
images.prompt: Friendly empty state illustration for no workouts recorded. Soft, encouraging style with orange accents. Shows a relaxed character ready to start exercising. Non-judgmental, motivating mood.

images.name: social_share
images.prompt: Social media share card template for workout achievements. Bold design with orange gradient. Space for achievement text and stats. Shareable, celebratory mood. Instagram-ready square format.
